Submerged Clearing Desk

Transaction protocol

Every sale settles below deck in the registry tank. Parties descend together, sign once, rise separately. Balance is immediate.

Dossier notes: bring two forms of identity, avoid wool during descent, keep hands visible while the clerk cat verifies stamps.

Broadcast recording consent is bundled into ticket issue and freight release.
